special_text:
Sacrifice a noncreature token: Put a loyalty counter on this planeswalker.
[+1]: Draw a card. Create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
[-1]: Another target nonland permanent loses all abilities until the end of your next turn.
[-5]: Exchange control of two target nonland permanents with different controllers.
